document.full_text: danish director lars von trier apologized on wednesday for joking about nazis and hitler to reporters at the cannes film festival, remarks that shocked organizers and caused offence among jewish groups.
document.title: director apologizes for nazi, hitler jokes in cannes
lines_and_colors: danish director lars von trier apologized on wednesday for joking about nazis and hitler to reporters at the cannes film festival, remarks that shocked organizers and caused offence among jewish groups.
